name: Daily Wisdom Quotes
description: AI-generated personalized wisdom quotes displayed as all-day events, intelligently refreshed every 3 hours. Automatically follows app language and supports multiple styles.
author: Sidefy Team
discontinued_reason: This plugin uses AI-generated quotes which may have quality inconsistencies and lack of meaningful content value. The generic nature of AI-generated wisdom quotes doesn't provide significant utility for users, and maintaining this functionality doesn't align with our focus on practical, high-value plugins.
